name: inactive medium hammer drone
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a medium clamp and a jackhammer. Servos and metal plating grind against each other as the large wheels easily roll over most surfaces.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

name: inactive medium wrecking drone
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a motor, a set of chains, and a menacing bludgeon. Servos and metal plating grind against each other as the large wheels easily roll over most surfaces.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

name: iactive medium saw drone
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with several motors and nasty saws. Servos and metal plating grind against each other as the large wheels easily roll over most surfaces.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

name: inactive medium drill drone
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a medium clamp, meant to hold prey into several powerful drills. Servos and metal plating grind against each other as the large wheels easily roll over most surfaces.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

name: inactive medium blade drone
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a medium, sharp blade attached to heavy duty flexible material, pulled taut by a powerful motor and held by heavy-duty pins..

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

name: inactive medium jaw drone
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a massive hydraulic jaw. Servos and metal plating grind against each other as the large wheels easily roll over most surfaces.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with tanks of insecticidal gas and powerful pincers. Servos and metal plating grind against each other as the large wheels easily roll over most surfaces.

use_action.friendly_msg: The bot rolls into action ready to pursue.

name: inactive medium flash drone
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with several hoses attached to a medium tank of flash and powerful pincers. Servos and metal plating grind against each other as the large wheels easily roll over most surfaces.
